Building 1.Attributes: Three-story building with a black round arch and blue paint, eaves made of tiles, two windows on the second and third floors
Building 1.Locations: On one side of the stone floor with a square pattern

First Floor Arch.Attributes: Black round arch with blue paint around it

Eaves.Locations: Above the door on the first floor of Building 1

People in Front of Arch.Attributes: Three people with different clothes and headscarves
People in Front of Arch.Locations: Sitting in front of the first floor arch

Windows.Attributes: Two windows on each of the second and third floors
Windows.Locations: Second and third floors of Building 1

Desk Lamp.Locations: Right side of the window on the second or third floor

Buildings 2 and 3.Attributes: Two buildings with the same outer perimeter as Building 1, but with only two floors

Stairs.Attributes: Seven floors of stairs with the same style as the floor
Stairs.Locations: On the other side of the road

People on Stairs.Attributes: Two people sitting on the first step and the seventh floor
People on Stairs.Locations: First step and seventh floor of the stairs

Small Blue Doors.Attributes: Two small blue doors with diamond patterns
